articles.title: Lefkios Paikousis
articles.contents:
I am very fond of data analysis, visualisation, statistical
modelling, automation and building interactive web applications. I am
dedicated to turning research and business data into knowledge.
I collaborate with both the private sector, for data analysis -
statistical programming - visualisation, and academic researchers with
survey design and analysis.
My core competencies are:
Statistical computing: I can identify and analyze trends or
patterns in data sets through the use of the statistical computing language
R.
Reproducibility: I can create reports in Rmarkdown documents.
Rmarkdown enables reproducibility and knowledge sharing in an effective
manner.
Data and database wrangling: I have extensive knowledge of the
dplyr package in R. Dplyr is the grammar of data manipulation and part
of the tidyverse collection of R packages designed for data
science.
Visualisations: Very good knowledge of the ggplot2 package in R.
Ggplot2 is an advanced plotting system for R based on the grammar of
graphics.
Web applications: I build interactive web apps using the shiny framework
Excel Modelling: Developed the ImproRisk model - a tool for conducting
deterministic dietary risk assessment analysis. It is built in MS Excel
utilising a series of excel functions and VBA syntax. It is now being
used by several European risk assessment authorities.
Training: Im an accredited trainer by the Cyprus Authority of the Developemnt of
Human Resources
Survey design, data collection and analysis: Expertise in
designing surveys. Implement data collection processes, data cleaning,
validation and final preparation for analysis.
Research. As an independent researcher, I collaborate with
academia in the area of healthcare.
Contact
You can send me an email: lefkiospaikousis@yahoo.com
